string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00000000101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: Why is it important to check a customer’s data connection first?
Why does an application need to allow permissions?

Customer’s account is suspended for data overage, however their billing cycle has already renewed and they have no other account problems.
You have already tried refreshing entitlements.
The customer needs to complete the carrier reset step, however they cannot locate the calling icon on their phone.
The customer’s phone keeps shutting off. You have already tried a factory reset. You have already tried replacing the battery and charger.
Why do you need to check the customer’s account?
A customer’s account is suspended due to insufficient funds. How can they reactivate the account? Select all of the answers that apply.
What should you do if the customer’s account status is Activated (currently Deactivated)?

You get a call from an LTE CDMA phone customer, in the U.S., their address is 211 McGowan St, Fall River MA, 02723.
Do they have good coverage in their area?
Who is the data provider for our Mexico customers?

You get a call from a 4G SIM card customer in Spain. Their address is C Rosa de Pasión, 28 Viso De San Juan, El.
Do they have good coverage in their area?

You get a call from a LTE SIM card customer in the U.S., their address is 8010 Sandgate Rd, Manchester, VT 05250.
Do they have good coverage in their area?
Who is the data provider for our Spain customers?

You get a call from a CDMA phone customer in the U.S., their address is 79 Bradford Ln, Rochester, MA 02770.
Do they have good coverage in their area?
Who is the data provider for our US LTE customers?
Who is the data provider for our UK customers?

You get a call from a 4G SIM card customer in the U.K., their address is 4 Oakington Manor Drive, Wembley, Middlesex, Ha9 6lt.
Do they have good coverage in their area?
Who is the data provider for our Global SIM card customers?

You get a call from a LTE SIM card customer in the U.S., their address is 2721 South Coors Court, Denver CO, 80228
Do they have good coverage in their area?
What is the APN setting a customer needs to enter, if they are located in the UK? (Remember to use resources to help you answer this question)
What is the APN setting a customer needs to enter, if they are located in Spain? (Remember to use resources to help you answer this question)
What is the APN setting a customer needs to enter, if they are located in the U.S., and they have an LTE SIM? (Remember to use resources to help you answer this question)
What is the APN setting a customer needs to enter, if they are located in Mexico? (Remember to use resources to help you answer this question)
